It\u2019s often a patient\u2019s first impression of your clinic, and a high-quality site sets the tone for the care they can expect."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How long does it take to create a new website?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"The timeline depends on the complexity of the project, but most websites can be completed within 6-8 weeks. All of our websites are built with SEO best practices to improve your visibility on Google and other search engines. We target keywords relevant to your services and location to help attract patients actively searching for treatments like yours."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can you redesign my existing website?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Absolutely! Whether you need a refresh or a complete overhaul, we\u2019ll transform your site into a modern, conversion-focused platform that reflects your clinic\u2019s growth and expertise."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What happens if I need changes after the website goes live?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"We offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your website stays up to date. Whether you need minor adjustments or want to add new features, we\u2019re here to help."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Will my website work on mobile devices?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, every website we create is fully responsive, meaning it\u2019s designed to provide an excellent user experience across all devices, including smartphones and tablets."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How do you ensure my website stands out in a competitive market?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Our designs focus on showcasing your clinic\u2019s unique strengths, whether that\u2019s your team\u2019s expertise, cutting-edge treatments, or patient success stories. We also incorporate advanced SEO strategies to position you ahead of competitors in search results."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"Can you integrate online booking or patient portals into the website?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Yes, we can seamlessly integrate features like online booking systems, patient portals, and other tools to enhance convenience for both your patients and your staff."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"What if I don\u2019t have professional photos or content for my site?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"No problem!
